ingredients.ingredient: 1 head broccoli, washed and cut into bite-sized pieces
4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided
½ teaspoon coarse ground black pepper
¼ cup Dietz & Watson Shaved Parmesan Cheese

cookingTips: Cut broccoli into uniform florets to ensure even roasting
Toss with oil and seasonings before roasting to promote browning and crispness
Add Parmesan and lemon juice immediately after roasting while broccoli is still warm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you tell when broccoli is perfectly roasted with crispy edges and tender florets?
